snippet: Thousands of refugees managed to get past a cordon set up to prevent them from crossing into the country from Greece.
abstract: Macedonian police allow thousands of migrants to peacefully enter country hours after several hundreds rushed blockade of baton-wielding police at Greek border, igniting violent response; most of the refugees are heading for border town of Gevgelija, joining thousands waiting for trains to Serbia and Hungary.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of refugees managed to get past a cordon set up to prevent them from crossing into the country from Greece.

headline.main: Migrants Rush Across Border in Macedonia
headline.print_headline: Migrants Rush Macedonia Border, Then Are Let In

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
